about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! My name is Diego Garcia and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2020 when I decided to try creating my own websites about things, I like such as videogames or artists ‚Äî that taught me a lot about HTML & CSS!
about.description_2: Fast-forward to today, my main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a variety of clients.
about.subtitle: Education

filmpassport.title: Film Passport
filmpassport.description: Film Passport is a web application that allows users to browse popular movies, search for movies, and add movies to their favorites list. Each movie has its own dedicated page with a description, trailer, and recommended similar movies.

bluebyte.title: Bluebyte Shop
bluebyte.description: This project is an e-commerce website. It uses HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, React.js, React Hooks, Next.js, Sanity and Stripe. The project has a functional shopping cart, a product quantity selector and payments made through Stripe.

todoapp.title: Todo App
todoapp.description: A to-do list app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the LocalStorage API, which allows adding a deadline for each task and grouping them by date, is an ideal tool for those who need to have a more detailed control of their pending tasks.

adviceMentor.title: Advice Generator App
adviceMentor.description: This project is a simple advice generator app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It uses the Advice Slip JSON API to fetch random advice and display it on the page.
